title: Shonda Rhimes Sells Los Angeles Home for $7.16 Million
text:
Shonda Rhimes has sold her Los Angeles home. UNCREDITED

Text size

Television producer and writer Shonda Rhimes, who is behind hit TV shows including "Grey’s Anatomy," "Scandal," and "How To Get Away With Murder,” sold her home in Los Angeles’s Hancock Park neighborhood on Friday for $7.16 million, according to listing records.

Ms. Rhimes, 49, first tried to part with the six-bedroom home in October 2018 for $10 million, but it would take two price cuts, with the asking price eventually landing at $8.5 million in May, before a buyer was found.

More: Catherine Zeta-Jones and Michael Douglas Buy and Sell in the New York Suburbs
description: The TV writer had owned the six-bedroom home in the city’s Hancock Park neighborhood since 2010
